website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for an elegant indoor dog house should check out this homey crate/end table.
pros: Can be purchased for both medium and large-sized dogs
Available in either a dark espresso finish or a lighter mahogany
cons: A few dogs are tempted to chew on the wooden bars

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: My whole family (including our dog) loves this crate! The installation was simple (though awkward enough that a second pair of hands really helps), the instructions were clear, and the end product looks great. Our dog was crate-trained for almost two years before we converted to this crate, so we have no issues with him chewing or fighting the crate. We removed the plexiglass on the front door (though I think it's a great detail to include as optional). We leave the door open while we're home, and our dog often retreats to it on his own. I'm more content with this purchase than any other I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Escapee

customer_reviews.title: Solid, looks great and it's big
customer_reviews.text: Came together easily, beautiful color. I did make the mistake of putting it together outside. I didn't want styrofoam getting indoors so I unpacked it on the patio and put it together there, then... Couldn't get it through the door. It's big. Here at pics of my 65 pound lab, who took to it immediately. (Scuff marks are my own, it came in great condition. I'm using it as a den for her, not a crate, so I pried off the door, not an easy task but I'm quite happy with the results. The bed in there is from The Dogs Balls.)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: There must be something tasty on the bars because our ...
customer_reviews.text: There must be something tasty on the bars because our dog chews them. She doesn't chew any other furniture or anything else in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I am SO happy with this item
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with this item. It is absolutely beautiful and the quality is extremely nice. I am 60 yrs old and my hands are on the fragile side. I had NO trouble assembling this crate, super easy! My only comment is had I seen it assembled (not a picture), I would have purchased a large. I have 18 lb Shelties and they fit just fine, I just like a little more room for them to "stretch out". Very, very happy with it. I have purchased 2 recliners to replace a couch, and this crate will be my end table when the chairs arrive.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE ANN MARTINEZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dog Crate
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this. I ordered the large size for our Boxer mix and he has plenty of room . He can even stand inside it. Our dog loves it and naps there several times a day as well as sleeping in it at night. Guests to our home are always surprised that it’s a dog crate because it looks so much like another piece of living room furniture. It was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Granny L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality appropriate price for what you receive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this crate for my new Dalmatian puppy. I have a similar crate for my adult male Dalmatian who weighs 70 pounds and is about 26" at the shoulders. The crate is of excellent quality and looks very nice. Quite satisfied with both the construction, materials, and looks. Dalmatians have plenty of room. I bought a seperate cushion for the boys to lay on. Check my other reviews for an update on that. Very satisfied, easy to assemble, took me abpout 45 minutes and I did it by myself (well both Dalmatians helped of course :-)).
customer_reviews.author: CaseyDalPal

customer_reviews.title: Well Made but Design is Lacking
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am satisfied with this dog crate. It looks exactly like the picture, same color and construction. Nothing was missing or damaged but in my opinion the design is flawed. The sides of the crate are attached to the top and bottom with bolts and screws but they are not secured to the front and back panels at all. They simply slide into loose grooves on the front and back crate panels. This causes the crate to be a little wobbly, not enough for it to be a problem but enough that it is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Williams

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in the living room because I was using a collapsible canvas crate (which is great for road trips). My dog LOVES this thing and now she just wanders in there on her own and naps at will (which she never did with the soft crate). It looks presentable as well with the other furniture - not like a dog crate. I'd buy this again in a heart beat if warranted (it's built like a rock though so I don't expect that to happen anytime soon). Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 1 year old labradoodle destroyed it the first time I ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 year old labradoodle destroyed it the first time I left him in it for 3 hours while I was out.
customer_reviews.author: RoysK

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to have a space for the pups in the living room but also blends into the rest of my furniture. Easy to put together even by myself. I didn’t appreciate any significant odor from it at arrival (or if it did, it has long since gone). I don’t think it will hold up to a chewer or scratcher or any dog that is determined to get out. I use it with the door open (swings all the way in or out to stay out of the way). I purchased the medium which was the better size for my space but it is a tight fit for my bigger dog (38# Aussie mix).
customer_reviews.author: amateur baker

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and beautiful too!
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitant to buy this pet crate due to its price. Our puppy seems so small and we still aren’t t sure if she will ever need such a large kennel. She is a lab/mix that we are told will weigh around 50# (already 24# at 5 months). I was also concerned that it would detract from the look of our living area. It is such a beautiful end table and so very well made! My husband accidentally spilled a glass of water on it and we were both surprised by how easy it was to wipe clean ~ the water beaded up on it! Thank you for making such a beautiful, quality dog crate!
customer_reviews.author: Nanc

customer_reviews.title: any dog bed thicker than 3'4" will not allow door to swing in
customer_reviews.text: The crate looks wonderful! Assembly was a breeze and took about 15 minutes. All pieces fit very well! The finish is beautiful!!! The only draw back is that with any bed thicker than 3/4" the door will not swing in! This is a great feature of this crate and is rendered useless with anything thicker than a bath mat! Make bottom rail on front section taller and door not as tall to accommodate decent bedding.
customer_reviews.author: MJDare

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this “crate” a piece of furniture that can function as an end table, it has great features for the dog owner. The removable plexiglass shield on the front gate protects the slats from puppy chewing. The fact that the door also swings in, allows the gate to be left opened without protruding into the room. This allows my puppy to use the crate as a resting place even when she isn’t locked up. The crate is sturdy enough to act as an end table and the wood makes it seem like furniture.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Great for already crate trained dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This came in perfect condition and was able to put it together very easily. Comes with a plastic guard glass for the door part, but took that off as my dogs are crate trained already. I dont worry about them breaking the bars. If just learning to crate your dogs, first use the wire crates and once crate trained, then use these. That's what I would advise honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: After researching and reading many reviews on various crates I purchased this one. It was very easy to assemble. The size is perfect. It’s well constructed. I bought the large size for my 40 lb collie mix. The one and only one issue is my dog is afraid of it. She won’t use it. She fears it. So I have a beautiful end table with a comfy dog bed inside.
customer_reviews.author: JennieHannah

customer_reviews.title: This crate is great.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, looks great, and my pit bull loves it. He hated all the other wire crates I had for him. He goes in here on his own even when I’m home to chill out. He liked to sleep under tables so this is like the perfect shady nook. If you’ve had trouble with other crates don’t hesitate pull the trigger on this great product. I kicked the door off twice by accident so note that that can happen easily— nothing that Krazy glue couldn’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: Evee

customer_reviews.title: Changed review
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave a five star review, because they are so beautiful and look classy as an end table. However, one of my dogs chewed off the wooden slats and got out. He easily destroyed the door, so if you have a naughty dog, do not buy this crate! It will not contain a dog wanting to get out. I have to buy another one with steel bars on the door and sides, somehow dispose of this one.
customer_reviews.author: kkg17

customer_reviews.title: Like the end table dog crate, nice design and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Like the end table dog crate, nice design and easy assembly. Two things you need to change on the door, please add metal tab screwed to inside of door frame so door doesn’t swing to the inside. Second take the door closer hasp and add a door knob to grasp. Trying to corral dog in crate and get closer in right spot is always a pain. How about a little customer service and send me the additional items. Thanks for shipping all the pieces in a heavy duty cardboard box. I was pleased that all the wood corners were protected and came out of box in furniture ready condition. Maya says four paws......
customer_reviews.author: Dan Kupkowski

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking dog crate
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a 50-60 lb dog and it was more than big enough. It looks great and matched our furniture well. However, my duaghter insisted on removing the plastic protector on the front of the crate despite my worry. Sure enough, the dog chewed thru the front rails in about 20 mins. Lesson learned: DO NOT REMOVE PLASTIC shield for front of crate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be better for my purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and appearance. Not many people can tell it has dual uses. Looks exactly like a side table, but makes a great dog crate. My dog is a small Italian Greyhound and he has plenty of space in the crate. I am not sure about larger dogs. I live in an apartment and the dual use is a real space saver.
customer_reviews.author: Ferg

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this beautiful crate. I purchased it for my miniature poodle. It is an amazing piece of furniture and I love it for my dog. He happily goes in his crate and because there is plexiglass over the entry door (which you can remove), my dog has never tried to chew on the wood to get the door open. It is well made and worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: C.C. Kretz

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write many reviews, but this product deserves another good review. I am very impressed with the quality of this dog crate. It is finished very nice and looks like a fine piece of furniture. It came very well packaged and was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Home guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome end table...pet crate!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality dog crate. Hubby assembled it in half hour. Everything looks great. Wood is finished, Mahogany paint/stain is excellent. I purchased the medium size. My Charlie is 18 lbs. He has plenty of room is stretch his little body out. Worth the price, glad I bought the Crown Pet Crate because it compliments my new grey sectional.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Wooden Crate
customer_reviews.text: Crate Looks Great works well she took to it no problem. First Day tho she grew on it wanting to get out. I would suggest more toys and and Super vision to slow down the Chewing . Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality kennel we use in our bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Great quality kennel we use in our bedroom. My only complaint is that is wasnt espresso but rather a maple brown stain. My bedroom furniture is a black espresso so I was trying to match it better, but didn't want to bother with returning for the correct color. Just be careful when ordering and maybe confirm with the seller that it is truly a dark stain.
customer_reviews.author: shar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. My dog loves it! He spends most of his time inside during bad weather. It’s a secure and safe spot for him. The best thing I could have ever done for him.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Pasternak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this crate. It looks great and has received myriad compliments from friends and family over the holidays. Up front, my dog weighs more than 50 pounds and is well behaved. When she is inside, she lies down or sits up and does not have any episodes. I don't think the crate could take her going crazy in there. But if you had a smaller pet, I think the crate would be fine. I agree with the review that said the screws did not line up with the holes for assembly, but it assembled otherwise well. If you want a crate that looks great and your pet is small or well behaved and large, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pruss

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product... Decent 'heavy' feel to i.. Assembly fairly easy It says it is espresso... Most of the wood in my house is an espresso color but this much lighter.. It is pretty accurate representation from the picture on the Amazon page. Maybe a hair lighter.. I am keeping it .. I mean I knew it looked lighter when I bought it.. But this is a 'light' espresso if anything. I do think the lock will need an enhancement as anyone with a whodini for a dog will see the lock can come undone fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful crate. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful crate. Easy to put together, but you do need two people. Pay attention to all the reviews that say they bought a large crate and realized upon its arrival that it was huge. Unless you have a dog over 125 lbs the medium size will be more than sufficient. I returned the two large crates I bought because they took up so much room.
customer_reviews.author: Michi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our shihtzu puppy now and in future.
customer_reviews.text: People compliment our furniture, not realizing it's a dog crate. My mom wants one and she doesn't have a dog! He can scratch at the door and it has no marks. The top is a good size for setting anything on. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Lippolt

customer_reviews.title: Meets my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble and is very nice as an end table. Although large for my little dog, I knew that ahead of time but wanted it high enough to use as a table. My little dog likes her new bed which is very important,too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Handsome furniture that works great for concealing a large cat litter box!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a dog, but I bought this to contain/conceal my cats' litter box. It does the job of containing a large litter box complete with hood, and serves as a handsome end table as well. I like it so much that I bought a second one for the second litter box. The cats like it, and I love it. It took me less than 20 minutes to assemble by myself, and seems quite sturdy. It's a little pricey, but I think it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Haze

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but came broken
customer_reviews.text: A piece from the back section came broken - otherwise, I would have given this a five star rating. Even though I'm sure it was broken in transit, it still indicates that it may not have been packed properly. It was too much trouble to return it, so we glued the piece back and hope no one notices. Otherwise, the crate looks good and my 20 lb. bichon is happy. We put a cushy dog bed in there so he is very warm and comfortable. He willingly goes in there every night. Before this we were using a plastic crate that was just a tad too small. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Little Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Easy Assembly,  Well made
customer_reviews.text: Love this end table. .Beautful finish. Parts fit "perfectly" together. I'm a 72 yr old female. Thrilled that No adjustments were needed!! I added a glass top for $50 (bought locally) to prevent damage from top usage. Perfect size for my 25# dog to move around in. In fact my cat went inside to sleep. I didn't know this and locked my dog in it. Both were quite content when I got home later that night. Would HIGHLY recommend this table!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: ... both the large and the medium size crates and love them. They look great in my office and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have both the large and the medium size crates and love them. They look great in my office and are sturdy. None of my 4 dogs has damaged the crates. The doors do swing in (as well as out) but that is more of an inconvenience occassionally than a real problem. I would definitely get them again (if I ever need too).
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but issues if you have chewing puppies
customer_reviews.text: Careful buying a wood crate with puppies as they are likely to chew the wood planks like mine did. Some of the planks look like they were hit with termites and even bitter apple did not deter them. Otherwise the product looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great looking.  Includes plexiglass on door.
customer_reviews.text: Product was fairly easy to assemble, which I did by myself. Looks great. I am very pleased with the purchase. The only thing that surprised me was that it has plexiglass on the door; I must have missed that in the product description. One of the selling points for this beautiful crate is that it provides plenty ventilation for your pet. I would think that plexiglass would detract from that. Since I was able to remove it easily, I decided that it wouldn't affect my 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the reviews complaining about the assembly of this beautiful crate! It could not be better made or easier to assemble. It is so perfectly crafted and INCREDIBLY easy to set up. It is hard to find this kind of craftsmanship today! And, the Espresso color is lovely . . . we love everything about this crate for our Chocolate English Labrador! So well made! Also, this product was so well packaged that it was pretty much impossible to damage in shipping. I wish all companies packaged their products this way! Thank you Crown Pet Products!
customer_reviews.author: Christina L Giunta

customer_reviews.title: Nice space and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Nice space and looks great. Construct-ability is OK (like any other flat ship product). Consider leaving the Plexiglas on the front door. Our dog has gnawed the front spindles on ours.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin from Boston

customer_reviews.title: Crown Pet Crate....not for the determined pup.
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice and fits into dark wood decor nicely. GREAT alternative to a metal crate sitting in a living space. However, an aggressive dog can easily chew through the the front grates and make their great escape. Which leaves you with a chewed up mess. An improvement would be to have metal black bars for the front grates. Otherwise this would have received 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: ddrum

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Beautiful piece of furniture and functional crate - ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Beautiful piece of furniture and functional crate - all in one. Exactly what I was hoping for. I am a female/57 years old (argh) and I put this together myself in under an hour. Looks very classy. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Love2travel

customer_reviews.title: Pet crate table, medium
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Took me about twenty minutes with a cordless screwdriver. Would have been easier with a helper. The kennel looks nice. It's the size of a larger side table. With a lamp and globe on top it does pass for furniture if the door is closed. The dog likes it just fine. Already kennel trained so it was an easy adjustment for him. He's very calm in there and can see out with no problem. It's a good combination of furniture and kennel and we're very comfortable with how it looks in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: sangarv

customer_reviews.title: this is a damn fine piece of furniture as well as a useful dog ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a damn fine piece of furniture as well as a useful dog crate. The medium is what I bought, and it is very roomy for my two little dogs (Pomeranian/Jack Russel mixes).
customer_reviews.author: J. A Cole

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Crate
customer_reviews.text: We bought this crate for our new puppy and so far it has been fantastic! It was easy to put together and it looks really nice in our bedroom as a “night stand”. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL piece of furniture for a pet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a BEAUTIFUL piece of furniture for a pet! Very pleased with it. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: silly girl

customer_reviews.title: Opt for quality over cost
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the disastrous reviews of other products, I was nervous to order one of these online, but this one is PERFECT! It looks nice, it's sturdy, it's a perfect sized end table and my dog's bed fit inside no problem. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiP

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little extra and get this beautiful table.
customer_reviews.text: This table is nice and sturdy. Looks very expensive, and is a heavy table. Finish is nice also. I highly recommend this table. Our dog loves laying in it. Eliminates having a dog crate in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Stuller

customer_reviews.title: Very nice crate for the price.
customer_reviews.text: We put the crate together without issue. It is beautiful - looks like a piece of furniture. I read reviews about dogs chewing the spindles. This is for a puppy, who I plan to crate train in a smaller plastic crate anyway. I have never had chewing problems with dogs I had crate-trained from puppies, but a security panel is provided, if you feel you need it. I chose this crate for the full view door and the overall look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking crate!
customer_reviews.text: This crate is beautiful and seems to be pretty sturdy. I have a mini aussie and he's already crate trained so I think this will be an easy switch and much nicer looking. Perfect height for my sofa too!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Redecorating the house and hired a high end decorator to assist. I needed a crate that would be in the corner of the family room. Not too visible but had to look nice and be sturdy and function well. Decorator picked this one and we have had it now for a couple of weeks. Looks great, functions well and decorator and I are both happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: IrishTica

customer_reviews.title: Blends in with our furniture beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine product, better than expected. Easy to assemble only a few minutes until ready for use. It did arrive with a slight flaw on the top, the finish appears to have been touched up but is noticeable. I would recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Around the Block Customer

customer_reviews.title: attractive and solid
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for several months and absoutely love them and so do our dogs. The small dogs we have are 20-23 lbs. They fit comfortably and can stretch out. We use them on either side of our couch. It feels luxurious to have so much surface space. They are attracive and solid. I love the floor space that has opened up from not having dog beds all over the place. Plus it is like a den for the dogs and they can hang out under there and not be disturbed or tripped on.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY a crate I can have in the living room!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. Didn't want a usual crate in my living room and this one looks like a nice piece of furniture, not a dog crate! Love being able to have a crate in plain view without it being an eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Siebert Baker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It fits so nicely into my living room so now a part of the living space. I especially love how the door folds in so not taking up space. The wood finish is exceptional. I have a 14mo old 50lb golden doodle and I bought the large size. She has plenty of room to lay down, spread out & turn around. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra R

customer_reviews.title: Great quality crate solution
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I'm glad I decided to purchase this crate over the cheaper brand options as the quality is very nice. We received many compliments from guests, and even my picky husband was pleased with the quality for the price. What I like about this solution: it's furniture that looks great in my living room, good quality, my dog likes it, guests won't realize it's a crate, and accidents are easier to clean-up in comparison to a wire crate.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS GREAT - EASY TO ASSEMBLE!
customer_reviews.text: A fairly high quality and nice looking product that was extremely simple to put together. Kudos on the design. One warning -- my small dog (15 lbs.) completely destoyed the door the very first night by biting & clawing the finish off of each one of the bars. I would recommend treating them first (i.e. bitter apple spray) as they now have permanent bite & chew marks along with being able to see the lighter colored wood beneath. Tried to restain, but does not look the same.
customer_reviews.author: TPH1983

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a Rock
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly and well packed. Yeah for no broken pieces! I was able to unpack it and assemble it by myself, although my hubby would have helped if I had asked. The large is definitely a solid, sturdy piece of furniture. I love that I can swing the door in out of the way while training my new Aussie to accept the crate.
customer_reviews.author: Jaina Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Crown Pet Crate End Table Review.
customer_reviews.text: Super dealer. We ordered on a Sunday, and had it by Thursday. Assembled easily in about 15-20 minutes. Sharp looking crate- much more pleasing to look at in our family room than the old wire crate. We will order another for our new Lab puppy as soon as she is full-grown and done chewing everything in sight. I made and added a small door stop to prevent the door from swinging in past the door latch when closing. A small handle on the latch would be nice, but not detrimental to my overall review of the crate/table.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love this product large enough for my pup to walk ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product large enough for my pup to walk around in. solid sides give her privacy. Pup sleeps comfortable every night. Highly recommend for pup comfort and for interior appeal to my bedroom nice looking instead of one of those wire crates
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Wood

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture. Good value for money and very easy to put together. My dog loves it. The only feature that I would love to add is for the door to swing out and around so that it would be flat against on the outside of the table. Great for a small dog such as a beagle.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crate!
customer_reviews.text: So nice! Great quality have it next to my bed. Perfect for my vizsla. If your dog likes chewing wood, which is very natural just spray some yuck dog spray all on the inside and that will keep it staying brand new! My well trained dog chewed some of the inside but again it's there natural. After sprayed the yuck spray and he has not done it sense. Highly recommended product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica herrera

customer_reviews.title: We have a dog that broke through a metal on but seems to like it and hasn’t done any damage so far
customer_reviews.text: Much larger then we thought it was going to be. We have a dog that broke through a metal on but seems to like it and hasn’t done any damage so far.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product. Takes away the harsh look of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Takes away the harsh look of a metal crate in your living space. I was concerned that my dog wouldn't go in it or possibly chew the wood but he LOVED it! I bought a foam pad to lay on the floor of the crate and he walks in and lay's down by himself. The only reason I gave 4 stars is there were 2 parts damaged upon arrival (luckily not that noticeable). Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This would have been an awesome product if it hadn’t arrived broken. The pin that allows the crate door to swing was severed so I can’t even use the door. Two pieces from the bottom were torn off and wouldn’t screw back in. A dowel was ripped out and now will not secure properly. The wood itself it great quality and again, if it hadn’t come damaged it would have been wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Hrdlicka

customer_reviews.title: I'm easily challenged by assembly but the company was extremely helpful ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely looking and functional crate. I'm easily challenged by assembly but the company was extremely helpful and walked me through all the steps. I just wish my dog liked it as much as I do! (that is NOT a comment on the crate..)
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful crate - nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this crate....and even more importantly, our 16 week old puppy loves it, too. The assembly was easy and straight forward. It took my husband and 5 year old son about 10 minutes to put everything together. The company has addressed other customers' concerns of dogs chewing their way out of the gate by adding a plexi glass screen to the door. It prevents the dog from chewing through the gate while still allowing him to look outside. This screen can easily be removed when not needed anymore. We love this crate! The pup enjoys his new home and we have reclaimed our living room! We highly recommend the Crown Pet Crate Table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a space-saver!
customer_reviews.text: This table is great! We house our pug in it at night and he seems very comfortable. It comes with a piece of plastic to cover the front slats if you want, but I didn't put it on. It doesn't come with a pad, so you might consider one or another dog bed. But it looks like real furniture. We keep it between two chairs with a lamp and coasters on it.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully functional!
customer_reviews.text: I now have a lovely bedside table that doubles as my pup's bed!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: Love this crate
customer_reviews.text: Love this crate. Get compliments on it from visitors. Not five stars because it is small. My 34 lb dog does not fit in the medium creat. Also had a scratch across the top. Has new latch on it then picture. I believe holds better then before reading other post. My dog has not broken out ever. A bit smaller then rated and a scratch aside. Very happy w crate and the compliments
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Furniture Quality Crate is Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Since our crate is in the Family Room, I wanted something nice to look at. This crate is perfect. Our dog Buddy loves it. The crate is sturdy and safe. It is heavy, so I won't be moving it. Great addition to our family room and we are using as an additional table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Beyond pleased. We need dual purpose everything in our studio. This crate is great quality and our pup took to it right away. And the medium makes a great table for my husband and I to use as a place to eat or play board games for the day to day
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kempf

customer_reviews.title: This is a lovely crate!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased with this purchase - easy to assemble, very easy, easy peasy lemon squeezy easy - to put together. Looks great in the room - dressy and goes well with other furniture. Not light wt yet not super heavy. Seems durable. Remember that it is wood and if your dog chews at all this is not for you. If you have a well mannered dog that is crate trained this is a perfect crate.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzed M

customer_reviews.title: Lab loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My Lab loves it. She takes all her naps and time to relax in it. Also, looks great in the family room. People don't really notice it as a dog crate until they see her go in.
customer_reviews.author: JimC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful option for my dog’s crate
customer_reviews.text: Love this crate. It looks so much better than the metal crates!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Gorham

customer_reviews.title: I love my dog kennels from Crown Pet Products
customer_reviews.text: I love my dog kennels from Crown Pet Products. They look like furniture and fit right into my living room decor. I was able to assemble both crates by myself. When I opened my boxes, the tops of the crates had cracks in them. I emailed Crown Pets, and they sent me two new tops! What great service! I would certainly recommend these crates and Crown Pet Products.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely works
customer_reviews.text: I like this crate because it's good quality and sturdy. It also looks nice and my dog is comfortable and happily goes inside every night for bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Dog crate
customer_reviews.text: The door is hard to open and close. Wished the door could be hinged to open on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kennel
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog kennel! Our yellow lab loves it and the wood construction looks great in our room!
customer_reviews.author: NW Bill

customer_reviews.title: I love it! And so does my dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made crate. I love it! And so does my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jerilyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this crate
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this crate! I ordered the L and it is very spacious for my lab/heeler mix. Not only does he love his "room", but it looks great. SOOO much better than the standard plastic crate he had as a puppy. Well built, easy to assemble, and very sturdy. I appreciated the PVC liner for the front as he is still in his "chewiing everything" stage. We have had no chewing issues whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer new

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made.
customer_reviews.text: I am over joyed with this crate/side table. Beautiful, well made, very sturdy, easy assembly and as soon as I set it in place my dog walked right in and claimed it for her home!!!
customer_reviews.author: las

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Was surprised at the quality of this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Was surprised at the quality of this crate. Had it assembled in about 10 minutes,looks great. No one would guess its a dog crate as it makes a great table. The dog and I both think it great!
customer_reviews.author: MARY KOLOVITZ

customer_reviews.title: Looks so much better than a kennel!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an end table to a leather love seat. It looks wonderful! My dog happily sleeps in it every night. I found it fairly easy to assemble. Looks very high quality next to the couch. The only thing I don't like is that the floor of the kennel is white, and I think it would have looked better if it was the same color as the finish on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Made incorrectly
customer_reviews.text: The kennel is very nice looking. However, while putting the item together the predrilled holes did not line up and I could not secure the top as intended. I was only able to secure the top to the sides with 2 screws and two dowels. For the cost of the item, it should have been made properly. If the item would have assembled properly I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wooden crate.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wooden crate. It was easy to assemble. Fits perfectly in our leaving room with other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our family room. Easy to put together with two people. I love it and so does my dog.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zetlmeisl

customer_reviews.title: These look beautiful in our home--everyone compliments them
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful in our home--everyone compliments them. The plexiglass is genius. The crates have withstood puppy chewing, and still look new.
customer_reviews.author: DKG

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, solid wood, stylish. Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Charlie R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Dog Crate
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and fairly well built. Blends pretty well with our other wood furniture. Just wish the door was reversible.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Dad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome- Nice looking furniture that's a functional pet kennel!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome- the dogs love them, and they just look like end tables that belong in our family room. Much better than the old standard TSA approved crates we used to have out there. Sturdy, well built- definitely a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Theronius

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! The reviews were accurate, it was very easy to assemble, very well manufactured, looks and functions as advertised. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenn

customer_reviews.title: Could be a bedside table
customer_reviews.text: We have a doxie that sleeps in our bedroom, but we didn't want her on the bed. She loves going to bed in this crate--we have a good, thick "doggie mattes" in there. She can see us and doesn't feel confined. Was easy to put together, and looks like an end table. Could function as your bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Libra

customer_reviews.title: Top notch , not for chewers
customer_reviews.text: We really love this crate table. Very well made and easy to put together. We did have an issue with one of our dogs chewing the bars. I was afraid of this when buying it but we decided to take a chance. However when it comes to the astetic quality this crate is outstanding we had friends over and they were starteled when one of our guys barked They thought it was just a table
customer_reviews.author: Denovan Ratcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Quality Crate with Plexiglass to Prevent Damage
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, and I didn’t realize it has a piece of plexiglass on the front so a dog won’t be able to chew or scratch the wood. My dog considers it her home base and goes in it herself at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: ML Merit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works well with our dog. Doesn't hurt himself like her did with metal one.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Love this item!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It's sturdy and durable, although my dog is only 15 pounds, and looks great in my living room. My only complaint would be that the latch is a little difficult to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Senga

customer_reviews.title: Wood not as durable as it appears
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with this crate when we first got it. It only took three months for my puppy to chew through the bars and escape. I do not recommend this wooden crate if your dog is a chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and easy to setup; setup time took me 5-10 mins
customer_reviews.author: orville rhoden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality crate for medium sized dogs
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality crate for medium sized dogs. The construction is fantastic and the finish is great quality. I have used the espresso version for over 2 years and it has held up very well. I added a square mat inside and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: rs1722

customer_reviews.title: It's real furniture, beautiful, and the dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm especially happy with the inward swinging door and waterproof floor. I keep the door tucked in so my dogs can go in and out anytime. They love sleeping in it and it looks beautiful. The espresso stain matches my other furniture perfectly. I wish I had purchased the larger size...a misjudgment on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Goodis

product_meta.title: Crown Pet Products Wood Pet Crate End Table
product_meta.description: Size:Medium: 29.7"D x 21"W x 24.2"H| Color:EspressoFinally, a dog crate with fine furniture quality. Crown Pet Products is proud to offer this decorative yet functional pet crate end table built with Rubberwood, a durable hardwood often compared to teak. This beautiful dog crate end table has a stained and lacquered finish just like fine furniture. The durability of mortise and tenon construction adds strength to the dog crate. Features such as the versatile swing-through door make the Crown Pet crate superior to other crates on the market today. The door can be fastened shut with a secure, stainless steel latch and can be rotated inside to provide access for pets while providing the benefit of being out to the way. The easy-to-clean melamine covered MDF floor is waterproof, which eliminates the absorption of liquids and odors, a very important feature for homes and pets. With your pet’s comfort in mind, multiple vents provide a 360-degree view, while providing excellent ventilation. Non-marking furniture glide feet protect your floors, and easy to use hardware makes assembly of these dog crates quick and easy! Tired of having your pet sleep in your bed, but still want them close? Use it as a decorative nightstand in your bedroom. The pet crate end table is available in two finish options that will beautifully complement your home’s decor: mahogany and espresso. Designed to accommodate standard-sized crate beds and available in two sizes: medium and large. The medium crate is recommended for small and medium-sized pets up to 45 pounds. The large crate is recommended for medium to large-sized pets up to 80 pounds. Crown Pet offers you a high quality and very affordable pet crate end table that you and your pet will be proud of.
feature_bullets: Dog crate furniture featuring durable hardwood construction that looks similar to teak
Beautiful stained and lacquered finish just like fine furniture with high quality mortise and tenon construction
Versatile swing-through door rotates inside so it is out of the way
Multiple vents offer pet 360-degree view plus well-ventilated environment
Waterproof melamine-covered MDF floor is easy to clean and eliminates absorption of liquids and odors - very important for your home and pet
Available in two finishes that will complement your home’s décor
Available in two sizes: medium for small and medium-sized pets up to 45 pounds, large for medium to large-sized pets up to 80 pounds
